name: Last Red Standing
description:
LRS is a two-player fighting game experience, allowing you to play as a mecha-red in a space arena. There will only be one left: you must push the enemy out of the arena in order to win the game, hitting him as hard as you can.
The game was entirely made by the reds: Tiziana De Stefano, Giacomo Bazzo, Niccolò Segantini, Pier Carlo Imparato, Andrea Settimo, Davide Piedimorsi and Giampaolo Gardelli.
Special thanks to Franco Giavatto and Giovanni Lastorina who took care of the music and sound effects and to Roberto Rotella and Benedetta Mardegan as supervisors.
